title: WTB: T206 Front/Back Combos (Updated Want List 2/21/2018)
author: Ronnie73

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Front/Back Combos (Updated Want List 2/21/2018)
posts.post_content:
Hi Everyone!!!  I’m looking to fill in a few spaces for my personal collection on the following player front/back combos.  Graded or ungraded. You can email scans and asking prices to [url]d2ad2a@aol.com[/url]

Thanks for looking.
Ron
